description: Conduct Wi-Fi surveys using Ekahau sidekick, Wi-Fi testing, and Wi-Fi client support
Develop and implement lesson plans to the standard of Skate Canada and the needs of the skaters
Teach the basics of skating to skaters of various ages
Coordinate with other coaches for games and events
Direct and supervise skaters to ensure a safe environment for all skaters and coaches
Work with parents to better deliver lessons to skaters
